mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into member (id, name, member_password, member_email, member_birthday, member_address, member_gender, member_phone) values (#{member_name}, #{member_id}, #{member_password}, #{member_email}, #{member_birthday}, #{member_address}, #{member_gender}, #{member_phone})
